title: Project-Based Hybrid Mode Education Program for Simulation Learning and XR Solution Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital tools and foundational knowledge in educational technology
context.additional_context: Emphasizes strengthening the ability to understand XR-based educational content production processes in limited technological environments (primarily smartphones) and develop simulation learning modules applicable to language education domains

learning_goals: Learners can produce one or more language education simulation contents using XR solution development tools (e.g., mobile AR/VR apps).
Learners can complete the planning-production-evaluation process of educational digital content through collaboration in a project-based blended learning environment.
Learners can explain how to apply smartphone-based XR technology to language education scenarios and adapt them to actual classroom contexts.

resources: Smartphone-Compatible XR Development Platforms (e.g., Unity Reflect, CoSpaces Edu)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
